Title: Ode to youth II
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The poster extols the joys of helping people (including elderly Korean ladies); and calls for the defense of the nation and its borders.Its companion volume can be found here.
Theme: Socialist Spiritual Civilization (1980-2000)National MinoritiesWomen's MilitiaPeople's Liberation Army Air Force (PLAAF)
